song.title: Convergence
song.info:
The .xm contained this text: ----------------------------- -=ConvergencE=- .-.-.-.-.-.-.
Composed By:
S C I R O C C O
02.04.96 What I think of the United States Proposed Communications Decency Act:
FUCK THAT SHIT! write to your congress man to protest the CDA Like what you hear? I will compose for *YOU*! Demos, Games, Disks, etc. Email me.
